newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Eastern HK offering over-subscribed.
newsitem.headline: China Eastern HK offering over-subscribed.

text.p: China Eastern Airlines Corp Ltd said on Monday that its Hong Kong public share offering was over-subscribed by 22 times and that U.S. and international offerings also received positive responses.

Following the over-subscription, 34.5 percent of China Eastern's global offering of 1.40 billion H-shares will be made available through the Hong Kong public offer after reallocation from the U.S./International offerings, the airline said.
Initially, 140 million H-shares, which are Hong Kong-listed shares of China-incorporated enterprises, were made available in Hong Kong.

U.S. underwriters also have an over-allotment option to buy up to an aggregate 2.10 million additional American Depository Shares (ADS) representing 210 million H-shares to cover over-allotments in the U.S. or international offerings, it said.
